name: Dinner Tonight: Leek and Potato Soup
description: I found it incredibly difficult to pass up a recipe containing nothing but potatoes, leeks, water, and salt. I'm all for simple cooking, but this is ridiculous. From any other source I might have dismissed it, but coming from Julia...
recipeIngredient: 3 cups sliced leeks (white and tender green parts)
3 cups peeled and roughly chopped "baking" potatoes
1/2 cup sour cream or creme fraiche, optional

recipeInstructions.text: Bring ingredients to the boil in a 3-quart saucepan. Cover partially and simmer 20 to 30 minutes, until vegetables are tender. Correct seasoning.
Serve as is, or puree, and/or top each portion with a dollop of the cream.
